User Story: As a user, I want to securely log in and manage my profile so that I can access my financial data safely
Acceptance Criteria:
1. User can log in using email/password
2. User can view and edit their profile information
3. User can update their profile picture
4. User can change their password
5. User's profile data persists across sessions
6. User can log out securely
7. User receives appropriate error messages for invalid login attempts
8. User's session is maintained securely
9. User can reset their password if forgotten

User Story: As a user, I want to configure my financial year settings so that my financial data is organized according to my business year
Acceptance Criteria:
1. User can select the start month of their financial year
2. Settings are saved and persisted in the database
3. Default to January if no setting exists
4. Loading state is shown while settings are being fetched
5. Success/error messages are shown when saving settings
6. Changes are reflected immediately in all financial calculations
7. Settings are applied to all financial reports and summaries

User Story: As a user, I want to track my currency holdings and their performance against EGP so that I can monitor my foreign currency investments
Acceptance Criteria:
1. View total currency holdings with current values
2. See profit/loss against EGP in both amount and percentage
3. View individual currency holdings with:
   - Current market rate
   - Average purchase rate
   - Profit/loss amount and percentage
   - Total cost
   - Current value
4. Error handling for exchange rate loading issues
5. Mobile-responsive display of currency information
6. Real-time updates of exchange rates
7. Historical tracking of currency values
8. Support for multiple currency types
